metadata.synopsis: Owlbear cub, now big is at the party organized by Withers.

0.speaker: Owlbear Cub
0.text: Nice to be here. Nice to see friends.

12.speaker: Owlbear Cub
12.text: Happy. Gonna live with the bear man - gonna fight him! But no bite. Promise.

24.speaker: Narrator
24.text: *The owlbear's eyes are alight with excitement - he can't wait to go home with Halsin.*

77.speaker: Player
77.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

82.speaker: Narrator
82.text: *He looks coyly at the ground, suddenly shy.*

31.speaker: Player
31.text: What have you been up to since last we met?
31.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

8.speaker: Narrator
8.text: *He snaps the air, and wiggles. He's either miming fighting a many-limbed creature, or dancing. It's unclear.*
8.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

64.speaker: Narrator
64.text: *He is, however, exhausted. He's had plenty of adventures without you.*
64.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

109.speaker: Player
109.text: You look tired. What say we find you a home? How about with Halsin?
109.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

90.speaker: Player
90.text: You look tired. What say we find you a home? How about with me and Halsin?
90.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

15.speaker: Player
15.text: You look tired. What say we find you a home? How about with me and Halsin?
15.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

43.speaker: Narrator
43.text: *The joy in the owlbear's eyes is clear - he longs to have a home, and Halsin is perfect.*

107.speaker: Player
107.text: I think it's about time someone looked after you. How about Shadowheart?
107.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

14.speaker: Player
14.text: I think it's about time someone looked after you. How about with me and Shadowheart?
14.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *The joy in the owlbear's eyes is clear. He longs for a home, and would love to stay with Shadowheart.*

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Sweet cub. Rest up, and you can come with me in the morning, if you like?
25.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

47.speaker: Narrator
47.text: *The joy in the owlbear's eyes is clear - he would love nothing more than to stay with you.*

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Come join me. You can help keep my followers in check - and feed on any who step out of line.
76.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

93.speaker: Narrator
93.text: *The joy in the owlbear's eyes is clear - he would happily fight, and bite, for you.*

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Get some rest here. You've earned it.
9.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

10.speaker: Player
10.text: No fighting or biting. Or I'll kick you out.
10.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

99.speaker: Owlbear Cub
99.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *The owlbear's eyes are alight with excitement - he can't wait to leave with you.*
36.context: NodeContext: excited - seeing the player for the first time in six months

39.speaker: Owlbear Cub
39.context: NodeContext: excited - seeing the player for the first time in six months

48.speaker: Owlbear Cub
48.context: NodeContext: excited - seeing the player for the first time in six months

11.speaker: Player
11.context: NodeContext: player has just pet the owlbear

2.speaker: Player
2.context: NodeContext: player has just pet the owlbear

105.speaker: Owlbear Cub
105.context: NodeContext: player has just pet the owlbear

102.speaker: Player
102.text: You're a lot bigger than Scratch now.
102.context: NodeContext: 'widders' is intended. He doesn't know who the skeleton man is.

20.speaker: Owlbear Cub
20.text: Yes. Big! But Scratch is smart, teaches me many things - like big brother.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: I'm glad Withers brought you here.
23.context: NodeContext: 'widders' is intended. He doesn't know who the skeleton man is.

83.speaker: Owlbear Cub
83.text: Widders? No. You smell very delicious. Follow smell - find you!
83.context: NodeContext: 'widders' is intended. He doesn't know who the skeleton man is.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: What have you been doing since last we met?

51.speaker: Owlbear Cub
51.text: Lots! Make friends with a turtle. A cat. A kraken. Kraken eats my cat friend, so I bite. Kill. With shiny clothes, I am strong.

28.speaker: Owlbear Cub
28.text: Lots! Make friends with a turtle. A cat. A kraken. Kraken eats my cat friend, so I run away. Sad.
28.context: NodeContext: initially excited and proud, then gets sad at the end

59.speaker: Owlbear Cub
59.text: Tired now. Want sleep. Want cave.
59.context: NodeContext: sigh - content but clearly exhausted

61.speaker: Player
61.text: You need someone to look after you. How about Halsin?

45.speaker: Player
45.text: You need someone to look after you. You could stay with me and Halsin?

60.speaker: Owlbear Cub
60.text: Bear man? Hm. He is big, but not bigger than me. I like him. I go to him!

96.speaker: Player
96.text: It sounds like you need someone to look after you. How about Shadowheart?

7.speaker: Player
7.text: It sounds like you need someone to look after you. How about with me and Shadowheart?

70.speaker: Owlbear Cub
70.text: Nice lady? She gives pets and tasty things. I like her. I go to her!

106.speaker: Player
106.text: Sweet cub. Rest up, and you can come with me in the morning, if you like?
106.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

13.speaker: Owlbear Cub
13.text: You? Hm. Always nice to me. Always give me pets. Would like that! Very much!

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Come join me. You can help keep my followers in check - and feed on any who step out of line.
54.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

26.speaker: Owlbear Cub
26.text: You? Hm. Always nice to me. Always give me pets. Yes. Will bite for you! Will fight for you!

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Get some rest here, then. You've earned it.
65.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

103.speaker: Owlbear Cub
103.text: Yes - nice here. Sleep. Pets. Friends.

94.speaker: Player
94.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

91.speaker: Owlbear Cub
91.context: NodeContext: said in a whining tone

73.speaker: Owlbear Cub
73.text: Happy. Gonna get pets. Gonna play. Gonna live with nice lady!

79.speaker: Owlbear Cub
79.text: I play with big brother Scratch, but am careful. He's small.

80.speaker: Owlbear Cub
80.text: Can we go home? Want to eat with you. Play with you!

97.speaker: Narrator
97.text: *The owlbear's eyes are alight with excitement - he can't wait to leave with Shadowheart.*
